text:
Hi <@UT32P87K5>
Thanks! You are right default menu module doesn’t allow adding images and description to the navigation. So we made a custom module that is based on the menu tag and some conditional logic using hubl filters and operators.

We are planning to add such mega menu functionality in the next update for our <https://app.HubSpot.com/l/ecosystem/marketplace/assets/themes/absolut-theme-by-kohorta|Absolut theme>, which is free of charge, so you could play around with it :wink:
great, thanks for letting me know. I started building my own, but do you have any idea when you will be adding the feature to Absolut theme?
<@U03LG2YJP8X> we are about to have an internal discuss about the next update today. I’ll let you know the details later
